title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.14 - Quality assurance program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.14 - Quality assurance program

State Regulations

The department shall establish and maintain a formal, coordinated program which periodically evaluates the health care delivery
activities of each facility within the context of the overall departmental
health care delivery system for the purpose of enhancing the quality of
inmate-patient care and identifying and preventing medical and dental
malpractice. Such activities shall involve all aspects of inmate medical care
at correctional facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7651.14

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
